mapper.select: SELECT REG_DATE, USER_ID, ACCU_NUM, ST_NAME, STATE, FINAL_DATE, ADMIN_ID FROM RV_REPORT_VIEW
SELECT REG_DATE, USER_ID, ST_NAME, STATE, FINAL_DATE, ADMIN_ID FROM REQ_APPLY_VIEW
SELECT OBJ_APPLY_NUM, ST_NAME, STATE, FINAL_DATE, ADMIN_ID FROM OBJ_APPLY_VIEW
SELECT REG_DATE, ST_NAME, REG_STATE, FINAL_DATE, ADMIN_ID FROM REVO_APPLY_VIEW
SELECT CAT, REG_DATE, USER_ID, FINAL_DATE, ADMIN_ID, STATE FROM INOUT_APPLY_VIEW
